description: This file defines the HomeFragment class, which manages the main user interface for displaying and interacting with a list of notes in an Android application. It sets up a RecyclerView with a grid layout, observes a ViewModel for note data, handles search input for filtering notes, and provides menu options for sorting.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays a grid of notes, provides search functionality, and sorting options. It interacts with NoteViewModel to observe note data and navigates to editing notes.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout, sets up RecyclerView with adapter and layout manager, initializes search box, observes note data from ViewModel, and sets up note click listener.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the menu for sorting options.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu selections for sorting notes by title or date via ViewModel.
